content: Prof. Vivek Kumar Singh Courses Taught Artificial Intelligence Computer Organization & Architecture Data Structures Information Retrieval Introduction to Computer Programming in C Operating Systems Quantitative Science Studies Systems Analysis & Design Text Analytics Research Interests Research Projects Research Supervision Publications Text Analytics In Text Analytics, I work primarily on tasks like Sentiment Analysi and Social Media Text Analytics (such as algorithms and techniques for Hate Speech, Hope Speech, Emotion analysis, mental health and online well-being, etc.). I have a Text Analytics research group which focuses on these tasks. See www.textanalytics.in for details. Scientometrics My interest in Scientometrics is on analysis of scholarly databases, computational analysis of bibliometric data for mapping research competence of institutions/ countries, international research collaboration, identifying thematic research trends in different disciplines, altmetric studies, mining scientific publications, etc. I have special interest in analysis of STI data for India. My research group has designed a Research Mapping system for India, though a bit old data but still an interesting visit, available at: Indian Science Reports (www.indianscience.net). Artificial and Collective Intelligence My interest in Artificial & Collective Intelligence is aimed at analyzing the structural and dynamic properties of collective systems exhibiting intelligent behaviours. I have designed agent-based simulations to model complex social processes and structures and used them to understand & analyze the dynamics of collective intelligence in social groups and organizations. 1.
